## PolyAsyncIterable.chunk() method

Return an iteration of arrays of size `num` (except possibly the last) containing groupings of elements of `this` iteration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
chunk(num: number): PolyAsyncIterable<Array<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number | Size of the chunks |

<b>Returns:</b>

PolyAsyncIterable&lt;Array&lt;T&gt;&gt;

A new [PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md) that yields arrays of size `num` (except possibly the last) containing groupings of elements of `this`

## Remarks

All chunks except possibly the last one will have exactly `num` elements. The last chunk will have less elements if the number of elements in the iteration is not divisible by `num`<!-- -->. No chunk will ever be returned empty or have more than `num` elements.
